title: Chtitha batata (Algerian potato stew)
ingredients: ['For the dersa', '4 cloves garlic', '1 small red chilli, seeded and roughly chopped', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'For the stew', '700g new potatoes, halved', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', 'salt to taste']
